listeningQuestion.question: What language did they speak at first?
listeningQuestion.translation: 他们一开始用什么语言交谈？

content.editorNotes: 本课讲述了一个有趣的搭便车经历，重点介绍了过去完成时的用法，以及一些常见词组的区别用法。

dialogueText.heading: 课文
dialogue: I had an amusing experience last year.
After I had left a small village in the south of France, I drove on to the next town.
On the way, a young man waved to me.
I stopped and he asked me for a lift.
As soon as he had got into the car, I said good morning to him in French and he replied in the same language.
Apart from a few words, I do not know any French at all.
Neither of us spoke during the journey.
I had nearly reached the town, when the young man suddenly said, very slowly, 'Do you speak English?'
As I soon learnt, he was English himself!

translation.heading: 翻译
notes: 去年我有过一次有趣的经历。
在离开法国南部的一个小村庄后，我继续驶往下一个城镇。
途中，一个青年人向我招手。
我把车停下，他向我提出要求搭车。
他一上车，我就用法语向他问早上好，他也同样用法语回答我。
除了个别几个单词外，我根本不会法语。
旅途中我们谁也没讲话。
就要到达那个镇时，那青年突然开了口，慢慢地说道：'你会讲英语吗？'
我很快了解到，他自己就是个英国人！

newwords.heading: New words and expressions 生词和短语

notes.toggle: n. 经历（可数）；经验（不可数）

notes.title: 过去完成时的基本用法
notes.content: 过去完成时由had+过去分词构成，表示过去某时或某动作发生之前已经完成的动作或情况。如'After I had left a small village'表示在'drove on'这个动作之前已经完成的动作。

notes.title: 时间连词的用法
notes.content: after和as soon as引导的从句中，如果主句是过去时，从句常用过去完成时，表示先后发生的动作。如'As soon as he had got into the car, I said...'。

notes.title: apart from的用法
notes.content: apart from表示'除...以外'，可以放在句首。如'Apart from a few words, I do not know any French at all'。与except for的区别在于，apart from更常用于句首。

notes.title: 反身代词的强调用法
notes.content: 反身代词（如himself）放在句尾时起强调作用。如'he was English himself'强调'他自己就是个英国人'。

notes.example: After the stop, we drove on to the next city.
The young man waved to me from the roadside.
He asked for a lift because there were no buses.
I do not know any French at all.

multipleChoice.question: What did the writer do when he saw the young man?
multipleChoice.explanation: 课文中提到'I stopped and he asked me for a lift'。

multipleChoice.question: Why didn't they talk during the journey?
options: They were angry with each other
They thought they couldn't understand each other
multipleChoice.explanation: 从上下文可以推断，他们都以为对方只会说法语，所以没有交谈。

notes.title: 搭便车文化
notes.content: 在西方国家，搭便车（hitchhiking）是一种常见的旅行方式，尤其在年轻人中比较流行。搭便车者通常会用拇指向上的手势（thumb lift）示意过往车辆。

notes.title: 语言交际
notes.content: 本课展示了语言交际中的有趣现象：有时人们会因为语言障碍而产生误解，但这些误解往往会带来意想不到的趣味性。同时也说明了在国际交往中掌握英语的重要性。
